gabini kanthawan bulath wita sapima hethuwen adu bara daruwan ipadena bawa nawathama samikshanawalin soya gena athi bawa lama roga wisheshagnya waidya dipal perera mahatha pawasayi.adu bara daruwan saha usen adu daruwan ipadima hethuwen owun roga gananawakin pelena bawa da me samikshanayen heli wi atha.

adala blok adawiya kiya sitinne, atham path antharjalayata ek kara aththe eewaye athi wadagathkama salaka bawath, haki sama witama pothak miladi gena prakashakayata saha karthru warayata sahayogaya dakwana lesaya.

yalith kolambaadi deshana samaga puhunuwe nirathawu apiude hawasata naresa yana ennan bawata path una.ape ranjith dharmapala deshakayangen prashna ahuwe hariyata prash na ahuwe nathnam daduwam karayi kiyana wishwasayenwage.mita passe kandayam hatiyata disthrikka walata pitath kala.disthrikpuhunuwata kalin hamowama athireka upadisapathiwaru hatiyata pathwimak dunne rajakariye yedena gaman puhunuwaganna.me anuwa puhunuwata hamathanatama wisirunuapi kachcheriwala upadisapathi karyalawala puhunu una.eeta athirekawa masayak gamaka nathara wela indagena warthawak hadannath una.dethundenek arenna api okkoma pitisara gamwalin aapu aya hitiye.ee nisa game puhunuwa apita aruma puduma deyak wune na.
